title: StarCraft 2: 15 YEAR OLD vs SCARLETT! (Best-of-3)
excerpt: Arrogfire is the most succesful player from the Junior Championships in StarCraft 2. In this SC2 cast he's facing off against Scarlett. How does the rookie do versus the veteran?
